event.title: A-66 bread improver is usually an improvement on a-800 100
event.description:
Cake production line involves tunnel oven, spiral air conditioning tower, and dough fermentation room. A well-selected bread improver can greatly improve the efficiency of cake generation line. So, how to pick out improver in cake manufacturing line?

cake production line

1. Universal bread improver inside bread production line

1a-800 bakery improver (full-effect formula)

Characteristics:

(1) Applied to a lot of sweet bread formula along with process

(2) The item volume is larger, the particular internal structure is a lot more delicate

(3)Improve the fermentation building up a tolerance and stability of dough (fermentation tolerance)

(4) The soft texture of bread is good, the color is white which can be not easy to age.

A-800 (modified formula) has additionally passed many tests and customer tests around the expansion property, fermentation balance and bread structure regarding bread, and the test demonstrates that A800 has advantages covering the main competing products in the expansion property of bakery, and the structure is also relatively fine and tender, and the effect can be recognized by customers in your house and abroad.

Specification: ONE THOUSAND g * 10



TWO. A-66 bread improver with bakery production line (high proficiency, low dosage)

Features:

(1) applied to a bundle of sweet bread formula plus process

(2) the solution volume is larger, that internal structure is additional delicate

(3) improve the actual fermentation tolerance and steadiness of dough (fermentation tolerance)



It may delay the aging of bread perfectly.

A-66 bread improver is usually an improvement on a-800 100 % effect bread improver, which often can delay aging, improve structure and increase volume.

Serving: add flour 0. 2-0. 6% simply by weight

Specification: 600 g * 20



3. Specific bread improver in pastry production line

1t-1 bakery improver (tissue improver)

Functions:

(1) especially suitable for bread surface pressing course of action

(2) significantly improve that bread tissue and raise the volume of bread

(3) to supply the dough more long-term fermentation solidity



4. Special improver to get 2H800 Hamburg in bakery manufacturing line

Features:

(1). Improve the mechanical properties of the actual dough

(2). Enhance your stability of dough fermentation

(3). Increase bread organization, improve bakery elasticity

(4). Reduce the defective rate of bread

Many emulsifiers are usually included to improve the dough’s excessive toughness, and the dough becomes necessary to have good preparing and swelling properties under that tinnitus of good dough freedom. The improver should also be adjusted in line with the flour technology involving different manufacturers.

Application: used for making hamburgers and other bread

Amount added: 0. 5-1% associated with flour

Specification: 5 kg by 2



5. Special improver regarding sugar-free dough

LD-500 bakery improver

Features:

(1) suitable for all kinds of sugar-free dough, such while baguettes, European bread, and so on

(2)Effectively increase the level of bread, more homogeneous bread color

(3) can effectively enhance the bar products of that effect of cracking

Recommended dosage: 0. 3-0. 5%

Specification: 1kg 10/ element.
https://www.bossda.com.cn/Cake-Production-Line-pl3078896.html
